badge.destroy.patreon_1.description: Pledge to the first tier on the Destroy Patreon
badge.destroy.patreon_2.description: Go the full 7.77 yards and pledge to the second tier on the Destroy Patreon
badge.destroy.patreon_3.description: Show ultimate support by pledging to the highest tier on the Destroy Patreon
badge.petrolpark.beta_tester.description: Help test upcoming features of a petrolpark mod
badge.petrolpark.content_creator.descrip: Give a petrolpark mod free promotion by featuring it as a content creator
badge.petrolpark.developer.description: Create code or art for a petrolpark mod
badge.petrolpark.early_bird.description: Be among the first 1000 Players to play a major update to a petrolpark mod
badge.petrolpark.nitro.description: Boost the Discord server with Nitro
badge.petrolpark.suggestion.description: Contribute a new idea for a petrolpark mod that ends up getting implemented
badge.petrolpark.translator.description: Make an significant contribution to the localizations of petrolpark mods
